changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.job_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier job bigint NOT NULL, -- The Job whose attributes are being specified attribute bigint NOT NULL, -- The Attribute or facet of the given Job being declared sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when a Job can have multiple values for a given Attribute text_value character varying, -- If the Attribute is text-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL numeric_value numeric, -- If the Attribute is numeric-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL boolean_value boolean, integer_value integer, -- If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL timestamp_value timestamp, -- If the Attribute has a timestamp value, it is stored in this column binary_value bytea, -- If the Attribute has a binary value, it is stored in this column unit bigint, -- The unit of measure (if any) associated with the given value notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding this rule research bigint, -- Indicates that this rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT job_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT job_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_attribute_job_fkey FOREIGN KEY (job) REFERENCES ruleform.job (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_attribute_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_attribute_units_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_attribute_sequence_number_key UNIQUE (job , attribute , sequence_number ), CONSTRAINT job_attribute_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0), CONSTRAINT job_attribute_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.job_attribute IS 'Attributes attached to a specific invocation of an Event'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.job IS 'The Job whose attributes are being specified'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.attribute IS 'The Attribute or facet of the given Job being declared'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.sequence_number IS 'Ordering and uniqueness, for when a Job can have multiple values for a given Attribute'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.text_value IS 'If the Attribute is text-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.numeric_value IS 'If the Attribute is numeric-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.integer_value IS 'If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.unit IS 'The unit of measure (if any) associated with the given value'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.research IS 'Indicates that this rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_attribute.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
